Class ReadableDataChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metsci.glimpse.util.io.datapipe.AbstractChannel
      • com.metsci.glimpse.util.io.datapipe.ReadableDataChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReadableDataPipe

    public class ReadableDataChannel
extends AbstractChannel
implements ReadableDataPipe
    An implementation of ReadableDataPipe that uses nio.
    Author:
    hogye
